quest.name: Rebuild, Reuse, Recycle
journal:
 Quest Sync
Tui-Shirr could use some assistance with repair work.
objectives: Deliver the lumber and ring to Tui-Shirr.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: Are you busy? If not, I would greatly appreciate some help with repairing this shed─it's something of a mess, at the moment.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: I'm low on lumber, but it'll take ages to get the work done if I have to stop and hunt down more materials. Can you bring me four solid-looking planks, for the time being? Some of the wood from the old sunken ships ought to still be fit for use.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: You're looking for wood that's not too waterlogged or splintered. Doesn't have to look appealing, as long as it's sturdy.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You notice a glittering object wedged in the crevice between two boards. Extracting it from its hiding place, you see that it's a ring─one that has fared rather poorly in the elements. Perhaps Tui-Shirr will know to whom it belongs.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: Oh, this is a customs ring! They used to serve as authorization for traders to enter Eulmore.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: How do I know? Well, I used to work in the shipyard, as a matter of fact. Read a lot about its history at the time.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: Someday, I'd like to rebuild one of those old ships─make it fit to sail the world on grand adventures once again. It's a far cry from stripping the same vessels for shed materials, but a man can dream.

dialogue.name: TUISHIRR
dialogue.text: I'll give you a portion of my pay for this job as thanks for your help. I thought about splitting my lunch with you instead, but the money is probably more portable. And considerably less ripe, at this point.
